elements.title: Chambers Street station (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Chambers Street station (pictured) was once called "easily one of the most decrepit stations" in the New York City Subway system?

elements.title: Arsjad Rasjid (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Arsjad Rasjid said that he learned of his appointment as chairman of Ganjar Pranowo's presidential campaign from a friend showing him the news?

elements.title: flag of Mato Grosso do Sul (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Brazilian military government changed the ochre on the proposed flag of Mato Grosso do Sul to blue so as to match the colors of the national flag?

elements.title: The Last Hope: Dead Zone Survival (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that The Last Hope: Dead Zone Survival has been considered one of the worst video games of 2023?

elements.title: the Blip (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Kevin Feige perceived a "direct parallel" between the experiences of real people during the COVID-19 pandemic and those of fictional characters in the Marvel Cinematic Universe during the Blip?

elements.title: 1930s Polish Andean expeditions (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the 1930s Polish Andean expeditions have been credited with several first ascents and the tracing of a new route to the summit of Aconcagua, the Andes' highest peak?

elements.title: Your Choice (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that "Gam3 Bo1", a song from the EP Your Choice, contains references to NFTs and Zoom?

elements.title: Big John Dodo (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Lord McAlpine commissioned 100 heads from Big John Dodo?
